summary: The module offers a collection of plotting utilities that generate 1‑D and 2‑D visualisations of Cherenkov photon properties (counts, density, direction, altitude, time, wavelength, etc.) from CORSIKA simulation outputs, and can bundle the resulting figures into a PDF document.
business_intent: Provide scientists and engineers with ready‑to‑use tools to explore, validate and present CORSIKA photon simulation data, supporting analysis of atmospheric Cherenkov telescope performance and scientific interpretation.
